name: Evergreen Defense
description: Represents the integrity and readiness of Evergreen's militia and defenses. Having more segments filled in will make things easier for you in later missions.

name: Machine Horde
description: Represents the number of rogue machines and the danger they pose. Having more segments filled in will make things more difficult for you in later missions.

name: Contingency White
description: Represents the CRT's opinion of you and your team. Having more segments filled in will improve the odds of the CRT assisting you.
